Package FactoryPattern

Interface IDataFrame

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeDataFrame, CSVFrame, DataFrame, JSONFrame, TXTFrame
public interface IDataFrame

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String at​(int fil, java.lang.String col)
    return the value of a single item (row) and column label (name).
    int columns()
    return number of labels
    java.lang.String iat​(int fil, int col)
    access a single value for a row and column by integer position
    java.util.Iterator iterator()
    Iterates over the dataframe labels
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> query​(java.lang.String keySelector, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> valuePredicate)
    return query of the dataframe
    int size()
    return number of items (rows)
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> sort​(java.lang.String column, java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String> comp)
    return the values of a column in the DataFrame following a certain order

  • Method Details

    • at

      java.lang.String at​(int fil, java.lang.String col)
      return the value of a single item (row) and column label (name).
      Parameters:
      fil - defines the row we want to look at (0,1,2,3,etc.)
      col - defines the column we want to look at (A,B,C,D,etc.)
      Returns:
      String that contains the information at the position (fil, col)

    • iat

      java.lang.String iat​(int fil, int col)
      access a single value for a row and column by integer position
      Parameters:
      fil - defines the row we want to look at (0,1,2,3,etc.)
      col - defines the column we want to look at (0,1,2,3,etc.)
      Returns:
      String that contains the information at the position (fil, col)

    • columns

      int columns()
      return number of labels
      Returns:
      int number of columns

    • size

      int size()
      return number of items (rows)
      Returns:
      int number of rows

    • sort

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> sort​(java.lang.String column, java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String> comp)
      return the values of a column in the DataFrame following a certain order
      Parameters:
      column - index of a column
      comp - comparator
      Returns:
      values of a collum in a certain order

    • query

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> query​(java.lang.String keySelector, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> valuePredicate)
      return query of the dataframe
      Parameters:
      keySelector - label of the dataframe
      valuePredicate - query expression
      Returns:
      query

    • iterator

      java.util.Iterator iterator()
      Iterates over the dataframe labels
      Returns:
      iterator
